# Overview {.unnumbered}

This is report writing guide for qualitative research projects

work still in development - constantly changing and will add new sources

This guide introduces thematic analysis based on the writings of Victoria Braun and Virginia Clarke, in particular their 2022 book "Thematic analysis: a practical guide" that you can access via the library: [https://go.exlibris.link/4s9L4DWP](https://go.exlibris.link/4s9L4DWP){target="_blank"} But also on materials already developed by Drs Ashley Robertson and Wilhelmiina Toivo both from the University of Glasgow.

If you want to apply anything other than TA, I'm not your person and this is not your guide. Not saying you cannot do it, but I would not be able to support you.


The dissertation should all the sections:

* Title
* Abstract
* Introduction
* Method
* Analysis
* Discussion
* References
* Appendices
